entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as someone who Harry and Ron are arguing with.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the conversation, arguing with Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the conversation, arguing with Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a main character who tries to calm down Harry and Ron, reminding them of Dumbledore's words.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who said something important about You-Know-Who at the end-of-term feast last year.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is a mysterious figure that Dumbledore warned about spreading discord and enmity.

relationships.description: Harry was arguing with Professor Umbridge, as mentioned in the conversation.
Ron was also arguing with Professor Umbridge, as mentioned in the conversation.
Hermione tried to calm down Harry and Ron, reminding them of Dumbledore's words.
Hermione also tried to calm down Ron, reminding him of Dumbledore's words.
Dumbledore warned about You-Know-Who spreading discord and enmity at the end-of-term feast last year.
